  • Description: 1. X-2024091080 Package was found on the dock with wet outer contents. Upon investigation it was found that one of the four inner containers had a loose lid, causing internal leakage. Package was placed into a hazmat bag, and then into a salvage drum. 2. X-2024091088 attachment Name:image000001.jpg 3. X-2024091089 attachment Name:image000000 (1).jpg 4. X-2024091090 attachment Name:image000003 (2).jpg

item.description:
Report X-2024091101

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-10
  • City: SHELBY
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: WAS LEAKING FROM A SMALL CRACK IN THE CONTAINER. RESPONDER RETRIEVED THE PKG, PUT IT IN A SPILL TRAY, AND TOOK IT TO THE DMP AREA. THIS PACKAGE HAS HAZMAT SHIPPING LABELS AND WAS PROCESSED THROUGH THE DMP USING THE FLAMMABLE LIQUID RESPONSE SHEET
